subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Acquired on waivers in November when the Anaheim Ducks allowed him to find his fortune as a No. 1 goalie, Ilya Bryzgalov wound up in the open arms of Phoenix.
snippet: Acquired on waivers in November when the Anaheim Ducks allowed him to find his fortune as a No. 1 goalie, Ilya Bryzgalov wound up in the open arms of Phoenix.
